text:
Cork, Belfast, Barcelona ONSITE - Senior Golang Developer #Go #Golang

https://www.teamwork.com/jobs/seniorbackenddev

Teamwork.com is an Irish, privately owned, developer-led web-based company based in Cork, Ireland. Teamwork.com creates task management and team collaboration software to support high-performance teams. The three products relate to project-management, customer support, and real-time internal communications.
